channel.title: ExpLock shows up after every command [delta]

item.title: ExpLock shows up after every command [delta]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

So for some ridiculous reason when ever I type a command e.g. “::players” it says My Exp has been (un)locked to (un)lock do ::lockxp (used the parenthesis because the command locks and unlocks.)
This is my code:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(lockxp")); { if(expLock = false) { expLock = true; sM("My Exp has been locked to unlock do ::lockxp"); } if(expLock = true) { expLock = false; sM("My Exp has been unlocked to lock do ::lockxp"); } }
Why is it (un)locking after every command?

Read full topic
item.source: ExpLock shows up after every command [delta]
